survey_content: Visit our fanpage facebook to receive the latest news and customer support
content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by BeeTV, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
Update version 2.0.4
Choose Install Anyway if you get Play Protect message.

Due to database upgrade, your watchlist is gone in new version if you dont connect to Trakt account. Sorry for the inconvenience.

- FireDL code: 038206.

- Filelinked code: 30837432

- Add feature to download watched history from Trakt in setting.

- Add feature to mark episode as watched.

- Add sort A-->Z on watchlist and collection.

- Add trailer in movies/tv shows.

- Add FAQ.

- Add ability to choose default tab.

- Add feature to force Android TV mode, only use on some Android TV box.

- Give MX Player Pro priority when choosing MX Player in setting- Add year of movies/tv shows on search suggestion.

Update version 2.0.3
Choose Install Anyway if you get Play Protect message.

- FireDL code: 460752.

- Filelinked code: 30837432

- Fix watchlist not showing.

- Fix crash on some devices.

Update version 2.0.2

- FireDL code: 508809.

- Filelinked code: 30837432

- Add ability to choose default player.

- Fix download subtitle.

- Change package name again, due to problem with Play Protect.
